mapper.select: select distinct b.user_code userCode, a.store_code storeCode, a.store_name storeName, a.phone phone, a.address address, b.user_name userName, b.user_acct userAcct, a.province_code provinceCode, a.city_code cityCode, a.area_code areaCode, c.dic_name provinceName, d.dic_name cityName, e.dic_name areaName, a.license_code licenseCode, a.village_code villageCode, a.version version from t_store a left join t_sys_user b on a.user_code = b.user_code left join t_dictionary c on a.province_code = c.dic_code left join t_dictionary d on a.city_code = d.dic_code left join t_dictionary e on a.area_code = e.dic_code where a.is_deleted = 0 and a.store_code = #{storeCode}
